I just downloaded my custom avatar from RPM website and uploaded the base RPM avatar to Mixamo to try out some animation. Here's is the .fbx file that I got from Mixamo which works perfectly.

Once I applied the animation back to my custom RPM avatar, the animation somehow distorted(only affecting the arm movement and it looks swapped the position of my left and right arm). Anyone know why's that happened?
